title: dEmOn sPeRmZ, SCAMborghini  7.30.20
itunes:title: dEmOn sPeRmZ, SCAMborghini  7.30.20
description:
In episode 683, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Sara June to discuss Representative Louie Gohmert testing positive for Covid after refusing to wear a mask, tech companies wanting Trump to win, Trump giving up on Michigan, services to call instead of the police, a PPP scammer, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Rep. Gohmert Tests Positive For COVID After Perennially Refusing To Wear Mask
  2. GOP Rep. Louie Gohmert Suggests Mask Wearing Gave Him Coronavirus
  3. GOP @RepLouieGohmert, who just tested positive for COVID-19 tells a reporter he blames wearing a mask for his result: "I can't help but think that if I hadn't been wearing a mask so much in the last 10 days or so, I really wonder if I would have gotten it."
  4. Tax Hike Under Biden Poses Bigger Threat to Tech Than Hearing
  5. Michigan Threatens to Slip From Trump as He Goes Quiet on Airwaves
  6. 99% Invisible: Freedom House Ambulance Service
  7. Florida man fraudulently obtained $3.9 million in PPP loans and used some of it to buy Lamborghini, feds say
  8. WATCH: 79.5 - Sisters Unarmed

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
